titleStmt.title: A brief view of Mr. Coleman his new-modell of church government, delivered by him in a late sermon, upon Job 11.20.
titleStmt.author: Byfield, Adoniram, d. 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field for Ralph Smith, at the sign of the Bible in Cornhill, neer the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Adoniram Byfield by Wing.
A reply to: Coleman, Thomas. Hopes deferred and dashed.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
